name: D.A.D - Defence Against Dots
description:
Defence.Against.Dots.Freedom
Shoot dots strategically, by having to guess and judge where their location is? Defence.Against.Dots is the third iteration of a game I'm trying to bring to life, that was first inspired and created by my father many years ago.

D.A.D 2
Previous version, all features have been improved in defence.against.dots.freedom, but you can still download this file if you wish.
